meanings.definition: The quality or state of being harmful or damaging.
meanings.sent1: The injuriousnesses of smoking are well-known.
meanings.sent2: The doctor warned about the injuriousnesses of not wearing sunscreen.
meanings.sent3: The injuriousnesses of eating too much candy became evident after the dentist visit.
meanings.sent4: The injuriousnesses of gossip can spread like wildfire in a small town.
meanings.sent5: The injuriousnesses of neglecting exercise can lead to health problems.

meanings.definition: The act of causing harm or damage.
meanings.sent1: He was held accountable for the injuriousnesses he caused to the property.
meanings.sent2: The injuriousnesses of the car accident were evident from the damage.
meanings.sent3: The injuriousnesses of the prank were not well-received by the teacher.
meanings.sent4: The injuriousnesses of the storm left a trail of destruction in its wake.
meanings.sent5: The injuriousnesses of the mistake were quickly rectified to avoid further harm.
